channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 周五公布的最新一轮对俄制裁针对全球数百人和实体
item.description:
The latest round of Russia sanctions unveiled Friday targeted hundreds of people and entities from around the globe https://t.co/0DfGxIfYzU

item.title: Binance 将支付 43 亿美元，此前法官批准了一项认罪协议，对这家全球最大的加密货币交易所处以美国历史上最大的刑事处罚之一。
item.description:
Binance will pay $4.3 billion after a judge approved a plea deal that levies one of the largest criminal penalties in US history against the world’s biggest crypto exchange https://t.co/xXSlniez5P

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 美联储的研究人员最近警告说，整个行业的交易标准可能会降低
item.description:
Researchers at the Federal Reserve are the latest to warn about the possibility of lower dealmaking standards across the industry https://t.co/8EMYjL5TeR

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 亿万富翁斯蒂芬-罗斯（Stephen Ross）表示，他正在寻求出售迈阿密海豚队的部分股份，因为近年来美国国家橄榄球联盟球队的价格飙升
item.description:
Billionaire Stephen Ross said he’s looking to sell a portion of the Miami Dolphins, after the price of National Football League teams surged in recent years https://t.co/vs9V2OEZAt

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 在全球经济增长和风险情绪因股市宠儿英伟达（Nvidia）的大手笔盈利而得到提振之后，美元 2024 年的牛市走势有望首次遭遇周线重挫。
item.description:
The dollar’s 2024 bull-run is on track for its first weekly setback after global growth and risk sentiment got a boost from blockbuster earnings by stock-market darling Nvidia https://t.co/j6BUDn0Hh3

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 散户交易的复苏使比特币价格达到了 52000 美元左右的近期高点。但目前的涨势可能正在失去动力，这种最大的加密货币将迎来一个多月以来的首个红周。
item.description:
A resurgence in retail trading has sent the price of Bitcoin to a recent high of about $52,000. But the current rally may be losing steam, with the largest cryptocurrency on track for its first red week in over a month. https://t.co/4cZGxOt8X0

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 美国最大的金融咨询公司之一卡森集团已批准为客户提供四种比特币交易所交易基金
item.description:
Carson Group, one of the largest US financial advisory firms, has approved four Bitcoin ETFs for clients https://t.co/9AkwmXQrs8

item.title: 美国国债收益率从年初至今的高点回落，交易商将注意力转向下周的供需情况
item.description:
US Treasury yields retreated from year-to-date highs, as traders turned their focus to next week’s supply-and-demand picture https://t.co/lFd2GIYbZI

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: Femsa 公布的第四季度财报未能达到分析师预期，并宣布对 Csuite 进行调整，其股价创下自大流行病以来的最大盘中跌幅。
item.description:
Shares in Femsa had their biggest intraday drop since the pandemic after reporting fourth quarter earnings that missed analyst estimates and announcing a shakeup of its C-suite. https://t.co/3uqMKXG8VV

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 数百万拥有联邦学生贷款的美国人又开始还款了。这对借款人和经济意味着什么？
item.description:
Millions of Americans with federal student loans have been making payments again. Here's what that means for borrowers and the economy https://t.co/hN7ZKKk7aE

item.title: 五角大楼已启动 50 多起与援助乌克兰有关的刑事调查，但尚未证实任何指控。

item.title: 杰米-戴蒙及其家人出售了价值 1.5 亿美元的摩根大通股票，这是他 18 年前担任首席执行官以来首次出售股票

item.title: 埃克森美孚正在考虑竞购其阿根廷页岩资产，因为这家美国能源巨头希望解除对南美国家油气资源的押注
item.description:
Exxon Mobil is mulling bids for its Argentine shale assets as the US energy giant looks to unwind its bet on the South American nation’s oil and gas riches https://t.co/eZfInUDEYB

item.title: 在美国一揽子制裁措施未对俄罗斯工业金属采取任何重大限制措施之后，铝价下滑，镍价也缩减了早些时候的涨幅
item.description:
Aluminum slid and nickel pared earlier gains after a package of US sanctions omitted any major curbs on Russian industrial metals https://t.co/5ASwgEYku3

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 一个十几岁的程序员是否影响了埃隆收购 Twitter 的决定？在本期 "埃隆公司 "播客特别节目中，@KurtWagner8 讨论了他的新书《Battle for the Bird》，讲述了 Twitter 的公司历史以及导致马斯克收购 Twitter 的事件。
item.description:
Did a teenage programmer influence Elon's decision to buy Twitter?

On this bonus episode of the Elon, Inc. podcast, @KurtWagner8 discusses his new book, "Battle for the Bird," about Twitter's corporate history and the events that led to Musk's takeover https://t.co/cK0aQzMdYV pic.twitter.com/ikxbRlPioJ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 债券交易商向美联储屈服，放弃了美联储今年将大幅降息的希望。
item.description:
Bond traders have capitulated to the Federal Reserve, abandoning hopes that it would slash interest rates aggressively this year. https://t.co/PW7YaLQrXk

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 纽约联储主席约翰-威廉姆斯（John Williams）表示，经济正朝着正确的方向发展，今年晚些时候降息可能是合适的。
item.description:
New York Fed President John Williams said the economy is headed in the right direction, and it will likely be appropriate to cut interest rates later this year https://t.co/mzKOPl9eRp

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 丹麦新任经济部长表示，如果欧洲试图通过向本国企业提供更多国家援助来与美国和亚洲竞争，很可能会吃亏。
item.description:
Europe will likely lose out if it tries to compete with the US and Asia by offering more state aid to its companies, according to Denmark’s new economy minister https://t.co/Ks8m61c9Hm

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 欧洲央行官员越来越强烈地表示，在开始降息之前，他们需要更多证据来证明通胀率正在回归 2% 的目标
item.description:
ECB officials are becoming more vocal about the need for additional evidence that inflation is returning to their 2% goal before they can start lowering rates https://t.co/wQ4Qh5tOsY

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 在首席执行官简-弗雷泽（Jane Fraser）推进大规模改革之际，花旗集团交易部门最资深的销售主管之一康纳-戴维斯（Conor Davis）即将离开这家华尔街巨头。
item.description:
Conor Davis, one of the most senior sales executives at Citigroup’s trading unit, is leaving the Wall Street giant as CEO Jane Fraser pushes through a vast overhaul. https://t.co/PTUCu6NAVx

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 哈维尔-米莱伊在布宜诺斯艾利斯会见了乔-拜登的高级外交官，此时距离阿根廷总统前往华盛顿在唐纳德-特朗普主持的活动上发表讲话还有几个小时。
item.description:
Javier Milei meets Joe Biden’s top diplomat in Buenos Aires, hours before the Argentine president heads to Washington to speak at an event headlined by Donald Trump https://t.co/q1buOZRWNj

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 曼联的新老板吉姆-拉特克利夫（Jim Ratcliffe）告诉彭博社，"这与 "主教练埃里克-十哈格（Erik ten Hag）"无关"，因为关于这位亿万富翁对球队未来计划的猜测仍在继续。
item.description:
"Do you have confidence in the manager?"

Manchester United's new owner Jim Ratcliffe tells Bloomberg that "this is not about" manager Erik ten Hag, as speculation continues about the billionaire's future plans for the team https://t.co/eHoqkt6MFR pic.twitter.com/mzBtqmnJIg

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 在俄罗斯入侵乌克兰两周年即将来临之际，贾斯汀-特鲁多总理的政府宣布对俄罗斯人民和企业实施新一轮制裁。
item.description:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau’s government announced a fresh batch of sanctions on Russian people and businesses as the second anniversary approaches of Russia’s invasion of Ukraine. https://t.co/HMB7QL5T3t

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 下周，欧元区消费者物价可能将继续保持稳定，决策者在确定利率之前将获得有限的进展。
item.description:
The euro zone’s crawl toward steady consumer prices will probably advance next week with data offering policymakers limited progress just before they set interest rates https://t.co/OQpJmOhs4x

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 欧洲央行管理委员会成员马迪斯-穆勒提醒不要过早降低借贷成本，因为薪资增长仍然过于强劲，无法与 2% 的物价目标相匹配。
item.description:
ECB Governing Council member Madis Muller cautions against lowering borrowing costs too early, with the rise in salaries still too strong to be compatible with the 2% price goal https://t.co/zuzA8I4wud

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 页岩油钻探商 EOG 公布了增加支出和提高产量的计划，但增幅低于分析师预期，EOG 股价创下九个月来最大跌幅。
item.description:
Shares of EOG plunged the most in nine months after the shale-oil driller unveiled plans to raise spending and raise production less than analysts expected https://t.co/6IKau1rI69

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: "曼联新任亿万富翁吉姆-拉特克利夫（Jim Ratcliffe）驳斥了他希望英国纳税人资助俱乐部建造新球场的说法。
item.description:
"I haven't asked for public funding"

Manchester United's new billionaire owner Jim Ratcliffe shoots down the idea that he wants British taxpayers to fund a new stadium for the club https://t.co/eHoqkt6MFR pic.twitter.com/9DwzGFj6DG

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 卡塔尔能源公司（QatarEnergy）以美国前国务卿、埃克森公司（Exxon）总裁雷克斯-蒂勒森（Rex Tillerson）的名字命名了其扩建船队中的第一艘新油轮。
item.description:
QatarEnergy named the first in a series of new tankers for its expanded fleet after Rex Tillerson, the former US Secretary of State and head of Exxon https://t.co/9OButYCZvp

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024
